texts.content_text2:
You are ask to present Marina's case at a professional conference. Will you share her name and case details without her permission, believing it will help professionals better understand children’s experiences.

As a lawyer of Marina, is this ethically acceptable?
texts.content_text100: Share the details for a better understanding of the case
texts.content_text101: Refrain from sharing the details to protect Marina's privacy
texts.content_text3: Even well-intentioned disclosure violates the child’s right to privacy, the duty of confidentiality, and the obligation to act in the child’s best interests.
